SYNTAX:
For name=value pair:
throw (message = "message", type = "exception type", detail, errorCode = "error code", extendedInfo = "additional info", object = "java exception object")

For positional notations, the sequence must be followed exactly in the same manner as provided in the syntax. If you do not provide one of the attributes, use an empty string instead.
CATEGORY: Exception handling functions, Data output functions
DESCRIPTION: A function equivalent of the cfthrow tag and is used in the <cfscript> mode.
USAGE: You can call this function by passing arguments as name=value pair or as positional arguments. For positional notations, specify the arguments in the sequence mentioned in the function syntax.
